original: Eliason, Karl Torsten Arvid, kyrkoherde, Svanshals, f. 9/6/96 i Alingsås. G. 33 m. Ejan Weiberth. Barn: Lennart f. 35, Anne-Marie 37, Else-Britt 44. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 29, teol. fil. ex. 30, teoi. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 32. Past:-adj. i Vadstena, tf. kyrkoh. i Valler-stad 33, v. pastor i Hjorted 34, kyrkoh. i Svanshals sed. 35, v. kontr :-prost i Lysimgs kontr. 37-40. Ordf. i kyrko- o. past:stämmor m. m.
translated: Eliason, Karl Torsten Arvid, pastor, Svanshals, b. 9/6/96 in Alingsås. Married in 1933 to Ejan Weiberth, with whom he had three children: Lennart (b. 1935), Anne-Marie (b. 1937), and Else-Britt (b. 1944). Completed his secondary school education in Stockholm in 1929, earned a degree in theological philosophy in 1930, completed a practical theological exam and was ordained as a priest for the Linköping Diocese in 1932. Served as a pastor's assistant in Vadstena, acting vicar in Vallerstad in 1933, assistant pastor in Hjorted in 1934, vicar in Svanshals since 1935, and assistant dean in Lysimg's district from 1937 to 1940. Chairman of various church and pastoral councils.
